All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBooking
The AddBooking class represents a command to add a booking for a customer on a flight.
AddBookingWindow
Represents a window for adding a new booking to the flight booking system.
AddCustomer
The AddCustomer class represents a command to add a new customer to the flight booking system.
AddCustomerWindow
Represents a window for adding a new customer to the flight booking system.
AddFlight
The AddFlight class represents a command to add a new flight to the flight booking system.
AddFlightWindow
Represents a window for adding a new flight to the flight booking system.
Booking
The Booking class represents a booking made by a customer for a flight.
BookingDataManager
The BookingDataManager class is responsible for loading and storing booking data to and from a file for the Flight Booking System application.
CancelBooking
The CancelBooking class represents a command to cancel a booking for a customer on a flight.
CancelBookingWindow
The CancelBookingWindow class represents a graphical user interface window for canceling a booking in the Flight Booking System application.
Command
The Command interface represents a generic command in the flight booking system.
CommandParser
Parses user input and returns the corresponding command.
Customer
The Customer class represents a customer in the flight booking system.
CustomerDataManager
The CustomerDataManager class is responsible for loading and storing customer data.
DataManager
The DataManager interface defines methods for loading and storing data in a FlightBookingSystem.
DisplayBookingsWindow
A JPanel for displaying bookings in a table format.
EditBooking
The EditBooking class represents a command to update a booking by changing the flight.
Flight
The Flight class represents a flight in the booking system.
FlightAndCustomerTests
Tests for Flight and Customer classes.
FlightBookingSystem
The FlightBookingSystem class represents the main system that manages flights, customers, and bookings.
FlightBookingSystemData
The FlightBookingSystemData class provides methods for loading and storing flight booking system data.
FlightBookingSystemException
FlightBookingSystemException extends Exception class and is a custom exception that is used to notify the user about errors or invalid commands.
FlightDataManager
Represents a data manager for handling flight data.
Help
The Help class represents a command to display the help message containing a list of available commands.
ListCustomers
The ListCustomers class represents a command to list all customers in the flight booking system.
ListFlights
The ListFlights class represents a command to list all flights in the flight booking system.
LoadGUI
The LoadGUI class represents a command to load the GUI version of the flight booking system.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the Flight Booking System application.
MainWindow
 
PassengerListWindow
A JFrame for displaying the list of passengers for a flight.
ShowCustomer
The ShowCustomer class represents a command to display details of a specific customer.
ShowFlight
The ShowFlight class represents a command to display details of a specific flight.
UpdateBookingWindow
